events.title: DSC F23 Intro Social
events.description: Join us for our Fall 2023 intro social! Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts.

events.title: March Madness Workshop
events.description: Learn how to build machine learning models to predict March Madness basketball tournament outcomes using historical data and statistics.

events.title: Nick Singh, DataLemur: Acing the Data Science Interview
events.description: Learn interview strategies and tips from Nick Singh, author of 'Ace the Data Science Interview'.

events.title: Deep Learning Workshop
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of deep learning, including neural network architectures, training techniques, and practical applications using modern frameworks.
